PSCT.Vegas:
① If a face-up "Fire King" monster you control is destroyed by a card effect (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. 
② If this card in your possession is destroyed by an opponent's card (by battle/effect) and sent to your GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Fire King Avatar" monster from your Deck.
PSCT.Meadowlands:
① If a face-up "Fire King" monster you control is destroyed by a card effect (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. 
② If this card in your possession is destroyed by an opponent's card (by battle/effect) and sent to your GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Fire King Avatar" monster from your Deck.
